attributes.action: Imprison all prison officers & others that work at HMP for smuggling contraband
attributes.additional_details: ALL prison officers & other outside workers must be imprisoned for minimum of 6 months no matter what they get caught with. If it's illegal they must face a prison sentence. Our prisons need to be safe & healthy places for inmates to serve their sentences and leave rehabilitated. Jailing these prison officers and outside workers will make others think twice & prisons will be a safer environment for both the good and fair officer's & inmates.
attributes.background: Prisoner officers and outside workers are not being punished enough for smuggling drugs, mobile phones , contraband, and other prohibited items into the prison estate. During lockdown due to covit one would think there would be much less of drugs & mobile phones being smuggled in. But it is worse

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure whether you want prison sentences for the smuggling of all goods or just for illegal goods such as drugs. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
